channel.title: Last Question
channel.description:
How do i make something carry on from logging out.. That didn't look quite right...
Example..
You're teleblocked in wild, the tb timer is 500.
It gets to 200, and you manage to escape and loggout..
Now usually, when you log back in, the tb timer resets itself to 0.
How do i make it carry on from the last number you logged out at?...

item.title: Last Question
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Store it in the player file, and load it upon connection?
http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/FileOutputStream.html https://java.sun.com/j2se/1.4.2/docs/api/java/io/FileInputStream.html

Read full topic
